source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video starts with a medium shot of three women positioned in the middle ground: one on the left, one in the center, and one on the right, all standing before a background wall. The camera, initially at the subjects' level, tilts downward, reframing the scene into a close-up of their lower legs and feet in the foreground. In the final composition, their legs are positioned around a vertical light tube that stands on the floor in the center of the frame, with the prosthetic leg of the woman from the left now prominently visible on the bottom left.
